EmailTemplate.name: Christmas Lunch booking
EmailTemplate.subject: Christmas Lunch on 9th December in Sofitel Hotel.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please be advised about the BSG family meal on Sunday, 9th December.
It promises to a fantastic event with an excellent buffet, Christmas stalls and the chance to have your photo taken with santa!
Regards,
Dilek & Christie
EFC Joint Chairs
The British School of Guangzhou World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Member of The Federation of British International School of South East Asia - Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Chinese Ministry of Education
